data.title: Charles Harington (chemist)
data.meta_description: Sir Charles Robert Harington, KBE, FRS was a chemist, best known for synthesising thyroxine.
data.text:
For the Australian politician, see Herbert George (politician).

Sir Charles Robert Harington, KBE, FRS[1] (1 August 1897 â€“ 4 February 1972) was a chemist, best known for synthesising thyroxine.
